translation.en: [TV announcer 1] It's that special time of year, the holidays,
where we gather together with the people we love
This is making me so hungry. Maybe there's something else on.
translation.ko: 이걸 보니까 배고프다 다른 거 하는지 볼까?

translation.en: [TV announcer 2] It isn't a real holiday if you don't have tasty, delicious food.
translation.ko: 맛있는 음식이 없으면 진짜 명절이 아닙니다

translation.en: But, Moch, our ice is all we've got while the store's on holiday vacation.
translation.ko: 하지만 모찌, 명절이라 가게가 문을 닫아서 얼음밖에 없는걸

translation.en: -Who could that be? -[murmurs] I don't know.
I'm cooking up a batch of Steve's famous latkes over here for Hanukkah.
translation.ko: 난 하누카를 위해 스티브의 유명한 라트케를 만들어
우리 명절은 꽁… 꽁… '꽁꽁 날'이라고 해

translation.en: I bet you two stellar chefs are cooking up a huge Freezie Day feast!
translation.ko: 우리 스타 요리사 둘이 열심히 꽁꽁 날 요리를 준비 중이겠구나

translation.en: Well, where do I even start? Hm…
There's so much food. Too much, actually.
I wish you could come over and eat all this food.
translation.ko: 네가 와서 다 먹으면 좋을 텐데

translation.en: Really? You mean that? This is so exciting!
Now, where's all the tasty food?
-How on earth did you even-- -Oh, you must be Waffles and Mochi!
He has told me all about the food that you have prepared for…
translation.ko: 너희가 명절 음식을 준비했다고 스티브가 말해줬어

translation.en: Don't worry, Steve Jr., the food will be out soon.
translation.ko: 걱정할 것 없어, 스티브 주니어 곧 음식이 나올 거야

translation.en: -[whispers] Mochi, can I talk to you? -Uh-huh. [murmurs]
Mochi, we don't have any food.
Freezie Day isn't a real holiday without food. What do we do, Moch?
translation.ko: 음식이 없으면 꽁꽁 날은 진짜 명절이 못 돼, 어쩌지, 모찌?

translation.en: If we give our guests a great big holiday feast,
maybe we can make Freezie Day a real holiday!
translation.ko: 꽁꽁 날은 진짜 명절이 될 거야!

translation.en: Take the Magicart and bring back holiday foods.
translation.ko: 넌 매지카트로 명절 요리를 구해 와

translation.en: But remember, you gotta be back before the sun goes down.
translation.ko: 하지만 잊지 마 해가 지기 전에 돌아와야 해

translation.en: It's a holiday, not a holi-night.
I've heard of a ton of holidays that happen around this time of year
translation.ko: 1년 중 이맘때 명절이 많은 건 알아

translation.en: for winter solstice, but never Freezie Day!
translation.ko: 동지니까! 하지만 꽁꽁 날은 처음 들어

translation.en: It's the shortest day and the longest night of the year.
translation.ko: 1년 중 낮이 가장 짧고 밤이 가장 긴 날이야

translation.en: See the position of the Earth, how it's tilted while it orbits the sun?
translation.ko: 태양 주위를 도는 지구를 봐 기울어진 거 보여?

translation.en: the position of the Earth means half of our planet experiences winter,
translation.ko: 지구의 기울기 때문에 지구 절반은 겨울이 되고

translation.en: making it the shortest daytime of the year!
When it's the shortest day of the year here,
translation.ko: 여기가 1년 중 낮이 가장 짧을 때

translation.en: it's the longest day of the year here,
That's right. Down Under, Christmas is a summer holiday.
So right now, it's summer and winter at the same time!
civilizations around the world have celebrated winter solstice
translation.ko: 전 세계 문명은 동지를 기념해 왔어

translation.en: because the sun and seasons are so important to our food and lives.
translation.ko: 태양과 계절은 우리 음식과 삶에 정말 중요하니까

translation.en: You need to bring back food for a Freezie Day Feast before sundown,
translation.ko: 해가 지기 전에 음식을 구해서 꽁꽁 날 파티를 해야지

translation.en: and I know just the winter holiday for you.
translation.ko: 마침 내가 잘 아는 겨울 명절이 있어

translation.en: [Magicart laughs] Yep, this is winter in Hawaii.
Makahiki is an indigenous Hawaiian holiday feast that lasts…
I know just the person for you to meet.
My chef friend, Kimi Swimmy, knows all about Makahiki.
translation.ko: 요리사인 내 친구, 키미 스위미가 마카히키에 대해 잘 알거든

translation.en: Okay, Mochi, aim for Kimi's boogie board!
translation.ko: 좋아, 모찌 키미의 부기 보드를 목표로!

translation.en: Oh, we're gonna go celebrate Makahiki today. I'm getting fish for it.
translation.ko: 오늘 마카히키를 축하하려고 물고기를 잡고 있어

translation.en: [Kimi] There's a bunch of fish down there. We call them u'u,
and they live in these dark caves at the bottom of the ocean.
translation.ko: 바다 밑에 있는 이런 어두운 동굴에 살지

translation.en: And I have to hold my breath and go down,
and then that's when I'm able to take my spear and catch 'em.
We always want these fish to be reproducing and growing
translation.ko: 우린 이런 물고기가 많이 번식하고 성장해서

translation.en: -I'm only taking what I need. -[Mochi] Wow!
We're gonna go fry these up for our Makahiki feast. Wanna come?
translation.ko: 이걸 튀겨서 마카히키 요리를 할 건데, 너도 갈래?

translation.en: I hope it's okay. I invited our friends from the store.
And we invited world-renowned chef Samin Nosrat.
translation.ko: 우린 세계적인 요리사 사민 노스랏을 초대했고

translation.en: -Mochi, you gonna help me cook some fish? -[murmurs] Yeah!
translation.ko: - 모찌, 생선 요리 좀 도와줄래? - 네!

translation.en: So, a lot of times, people eat fish as fish fillets,
where they're just in these rectangles and they don't have any skins or bones,
translation.ko: 직사각형 모양으로 껍질과 가시를 빼고 말이야

translation.en: So you're always gonna remember that it's a fish.
[Kimi] Mochi, while I finish up, why don't you help the kids make some poi?
translation.ko: 모찌, 내가 마무리할 동안 애들이 포이 만드는 거 도와줄래?

translation.en: Poi is mashed kalo that you pound with this kind of rock.
translation.ko: 포이는 으깬 토란이야 이런 돌로 찧어

translation.en: [woman] So Makahiki is all about a change of season.
translation.ko: 마카히키에 중요하게 여기는 건 계절의 변화야

translation.en: We celebrate the land's abundance to feed us.
translation.ko: 우리에게 먹을 것을 주는 대지의 풍요로움을 기념하지

translation.en: There's just something really special about eating close to home
translation.ko: 지역에서 난 음식을 먹고 꼭 필요한 것만 취하는 건

translation.en: and only taking what you need
because that's how you take care of your home.
There's a bite of fish if you want.
-[Mochi murmurs and purrs] -[Kimi] What do you think?
That's really what we're celebrating when we celebrate Makahiki.
translation.ko: 마카히키를 지낼 때 우리가 진짜 기념하는 건

translation.en: Food and the land and the community.
And that's worth celebrating, don't you think?
translation.ko: 기념할 만한 가치가 있지 안 그래?

translation.en: If you take care of the food, the food will take care of you.
translation.ko: 음식을 잘 보살펴 주면 음식이 널 보살펴 줄 거야

translation.en: Hey, Mochi, wanna play a game?
[woman] Here you go, Mochi. Now you're part of the ohana.
Ah no, who could that be?
Well, I'm famished, but where's all the food?
So, Waffles, tell me all about your menu inspiration.
translation.ko: 와플, 오늘 요리 얘기 좀 해줘

translation.en: I wanna know everything about this party.
translation.ko: 이 파티에 대해 전부 다 알고 싶거든

translation.en: -Uh… -You must have been cooking for days!
Hey, everyone! Look what I found!
[gasps] No, Steve, don't flip the switch!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 스티브, 스위치 켜지 마!

translation.en: Guys, I just need to turn this thing off quick. [grunts]
Shelfie invited me. We're in yoga class together.
translation.ko: 셸피의 초대를 받았어요 요가 수업을 같이 듣거든요

translation.en: Your timing, like your talent, is impeccable, Tracee.
We're just about to eat snow cones.
Ooh, well, I can't say no cone to a snow cone.
-[horn honks] -Mochi, say aloha. We gotta jet!
translation.ko: 모찌, 작별 인사를 해! 우리 가야 해!

translation.en: Take as much poi as you need and anything else you want.
translation.ko: 그래, 필요한 만큼 포이를 가져가 다른 것도 뭐든 좋아

translation.en: [Waffles] I hope that's Mochi and the food.
Oh yes! Is that what I think it is?
[baker] Our friends the Pupcakes, of course!
Yay, even more mouths to feed. Cool.
I knew you would be so happy.
[sighs] I think I better call Mochi.
Well, that sounds like an amazing holiday food,
but we have way more guests than we thought.
We're gonna need even more food for our Freezie Day dinner.
translation.ko: 꽁꽁 날 파티 요리가 더 필요해

translation.en: Well, since it's the winter solstice,
we could go to Sweden for Saint Lucy's Day,
or we could go to Guatemala for Fiesta de Santo Tomás,
Wait! I know where we should go to top off your Freezie Day feast.
translation.ko: 잠깐! 꽁꽁 날 파티 마무리로 어디를 가야 할지 알아!

translation.en: The Sámi people there celebrate Juovllat,
a cozy holiday when families gather to sing
translation.ko: 오붓한 명절로 가족이 모여 노래도 하고

translation.en: and eat special foods they've saved all winter.
Let's go see my friend Maret in Norway. She's a reindeer herder.
translation.ko: 노르웨이로 가서 순록을 치는 내 친구 매럿을 만나자

translation.en: She can hook you up with food for your Freezie Day dinner.
translation.ko: 꽁꽁 날 만찬에 먹을 요리를 챙겨 줄 거야

translation.en: Well, just get back with lots of food, okay? Before sundown.
translation.ko: 음식을 많이 가지고 돌아와 해가 지기 전에 말이야

translation.en: You have to celebrate the Juovllat with us.
Do you know how to drive the snowmobile?
Let's go to get something to eat.
For our holiday, Juovllat, we make Sami pancakes.
translation.ko: 히오블랏이 되면 우리는 사미 팬케이크를 만들어

translation.en: [Maret] Sámi people eat reindeer because reindeer eat lichen under the snow
translation.ko: 사미족은 순록을 먹어 순록은 눈에 파묻힌 이끼와 식물을 먹으니까

translation.en: which gives us vitamins we can't get in winter without them.
translation.ko: 겨울철에는 구할 수 없는 비타민을 제공해 주거든

translation.en: We take care of reindeer, and they take care of us.
translation.ko: 우리는 순록을 보살피고 순록은 우리를 보살피는 거야

translation.en: [Waffles] Come on, Moch. Where are you?
Hey, Waffles, come listen to Samin.
translation.ko: 와플, 와서 사민 얘기 좀 들어 봐

translation.en: In Iran, we have a holiday called Yalda.
It's a winter celebration that dates back 2500 years.
Let me show you. These are some of my favorite foods we eat.
translation.ko: 내가 좋아하는 우리 명절 음식을 보여줄게요

translation.en: all we do is eat and eat and eat.
translation.ko: - 우린 먹고, 먹고, 또 먹기만 해 - 멋지다

translation.en: -Just like we're gonna do here tonight. -Yes!
Freezie Day will never be real without some food.
translation.ko: 음식이 없이는 꽁꽁 날은 절대 불가능해

translation.en: -[Mochi murmurs] -Mochi, are you on your way?
What? You are still in Norway?
Oh, Mrs. O's calling. She'll know what to do.
translation.ko: 오바마 부인 전화야 어떻게 할지 알려주실 거야

translation.en: -What? How did you know? -Shelfie told me all about it.
translation.ko: - 네? 어떻게 아셨어요? - 셸피가 다 말해줬지

translation.en: Look, can I tell you something, Waffles?
Our Christmas turkey didn't go as planned either.
translation.ko: 우리 크리스마스 칠면조도 계획대로 안 됐어

translation.en: -Happy Freezie Day! Mrs. O, everybody! -[Samin] Hi, Mrs. O!
translation.ko: - 꽁꽁 날 축하해요, 오바마 부인! - 안녕하세요, 오바마 부인!

translation.en: You guys singing any good Freezie Day songs?
I'd love to sing, but we don't have a piano.
[Busy] Of course she does. She's Tracee Ellis Ross!
You're putting a lot of pressure on me, Busy.
Teach us a Freezie Day song, won't you, Waffles?
translation.ko: 꽁꽁 날 노래 좀 가르쳐 줘, 와플

translation.en: Go, Waffles, go! Teach us a good song.
translation.ko: 그래, 와플, 어서! 멋진 노래를 가르쳐 줘

translation.en: ♪ There's dinner plates It's Freezie Day ♪
-Yeah, we'll eat a traditional feast. -[Tracee] So sweet!
translation.ko: - 그래, 전통 요리를 먹을 거야 - 멋져

translation.en: [sighs] Mochi, I'm counting on you, bud.
[Maret] Our traditional place to cook is the lavvu.
-I'm making blood pancakes on the fire. -Oh…
translation.ko: 이제 불에 순록 피 팬케이크를 만들게

translation.en: [Maret] And then we add the cloudberry jam.
[Maret] Cloudberries are a golden berry we love to pick in the summertime.
translation.ko: 호로딸기는 여름에 즐겨 따는 황금색 열매야

translation.en: -We have made a gift for you. -[murmurs]
Mochi! We gotta get back to Waffles and Freezie Day!
Wait! Before you go, I have made some of my cloudberry jam for you.
translation.ko: 잠깐! 네게 주려고 호로딸기 잼을 만들었단다

translation.en: Let's let Waffles know the good news!
Wow, Moch, you got cloudberry jam in Norway?
translation.ko: 와, 모찌! 노르웨이에서 호로딸기 잼을 얻었어?

translation.en: When will you be home? The sun is gonna set any minute now.
translation.ko: 집에는 언제 와? 곧 해가 질 텐데

translation.en: We need to serve Freezie Day dinner before the sun goes down.
translation.ko: 그 전에 꽁꽁 날 요리를 대접해야지

translation.en: Just gotta get through this tiny blizzard up ahead, and then we're cool.
translation.ko: 요 앞에 있는 작은 눈보라만 시원하게 뚫으면 돼

translation.en: Yeah, but it's nothing ol' Magicart can't handle!
translation.ko: 그래, 하지만 이 매지카트는 감당할 수 있어

translation.en: Oh no. No, no, no. The sun.
translation.ko: 이런! 안 돼, 안 돼! 해가…

translation.en: Oh no, Mochi, the sun went down!
Of course. Don't I look like I'm okay?
To be honest, no, not really.
Mochi and I made it up.
The truth is we have no holiday, no food,
and now Mochi and Magicart are caught in a blizzard. [squeals]
-It's time you told everyone the truth. -[sniffles]
translation.ko: 모두에게 진실을 말할 때가 된 것 같구나

translation.en: We did make it! We survived!
And then you, Samin, you were so excited.
Then the Pupcakes came and they were all over the place.
translation.ko: 그 뒤엔 펍케이크들이 와 흥분해서 돌아다니고

translation.en: And one thing led to another and…
Wait, so am I not really here?
Is this a dream? Am I in a simulation?
Oh, Mochi, so glad you're back safe.
But the jig is up. They know Freezie Day isn't real.
translation.ko: 하지만 다 들통났어 꽁꽁 날이 가짜라는 거 다들 알아

translation.en: So the holidays aren't just about food.
They're about, you know, being with family and friends.
And singing songs and playing games.
And more than that, they're about the universal traditions
that have been bringing humans together since the dawn of time.
Well, the sun went down though.
You know, not to bring up my super cool holiday again,
translation.ko: 내 멋진 명절 얘기를 다시 하자는 건 아니지만

translation.en: but Yalda actually starts after the sun goes down.
translation.ko: 얄다는 사실 해가 진 뒤에 시작해

translation.en: Moch, do you know what this means?
♪ We celebrate with all our friends And eat real late ♪
♪ And we will cook a traditional feast ♪
[Steve] ♪ We'll whisk and chop And use other techniques! ♪
Mochi, look! Freezie Day is real.
translation.ko: 모찌, 봐! 꽁꽁 날이 진짜가 됐어!

translation.en: We made our own holiday tradition.
and we're up way past our bedtime.
♪ A special time to be together ♪
♪ You can feel the magic in the air ♪
♪ See the smiles around the table ♪
♪ A time to give and a time to share ♪
♪ And there's my favorite treat That I love to serve ♪
♪ We celebrate With hearts as full as dinner plates ♪

translation.ko: 남은 음식이 몇 주는 갈 거야

translation.en: ♪ We celebrate With hearts as full as dinner plates ♪

translation.ko: 남은 음식이 몇 주는 갈 거야

translation.en: ♪ We celebrate With hearts as full as dinner plates ♪
♪ There's lots to eat We'll have leftovers for weeks ♪
translation.ko: 먹을 것도 많지 남은 음식이 몇 주는 갈 거야

translation.en: -♪ It's Freezie Day ♪ -♪ Oh, it's Freezie Day ♪
I hope they ask us to clean up!
